DOCNAME: CASE OF EUGENIA MICHAELIDOU DEVELOPMENTS LTD AND MICHAEL TYMVIOS v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Preliminary objections dismissed (ratione temporis, ratione loci, victim, non-exhaustion of domestic remedies);Violation of P1-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 14;Not necessary to examine Art. 8;Just satisfaction reserved;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The first applicant is a private company incorporated under NORP law and registered in GPE on DATE . It has CARDINAL director and CARDINAL shareholders . The second applicant is a NORP national of NORP - Cypriot origin , born in DATE and living in GPE . He is the director of the first applicant and also its principal shareholder . The second shareholder of the company is the second applicant 's wife . From the date of the incorporation of the first applicant until DATE , the second applicant owned CARDINAL shares and his wife CARDINAL shares . However , since DATE the applicant has been the owner of CARDINAL shares and his wife the owner of CARDINAL share .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the first applicant became the co - owner of a substantial amount of property by way of gift . The property is situated in the village of PERSON , in the northern district of GPE , located in the “ GPE ” ( “ GPE ” ) . It consists of CARDINAL plots of land with registration numbers ACARDINAL , ACARDINAL , ACARDINAL , BCARDINAL , ORG , BCARDINAL , BCARDINAL , ECARDINAL , ECARDINAL , ECARDINAL , PERSON , ECARDINAL , ECARDINAL , PERSON , ORG , PERSON , PERSON , QUANTITY , PERSON , GCARDINAL , GCARDINAL , GCARDINAL , GCARDINAL , GCARDINAL , PERSON , PERSON , PERSON , PERSON , GCARDINAL , PERSON , PERSON , HCARDINAL , PERSON , HCARDINAL , PERSON , PERSON , ORG , GPE , HCARDINAL , PERSON , ORG , HCARDINAL , HCARDINAL , ORG , GPE , PERSON , GPE , PERSON and PERSON .

CARDINAL . The first applicant owned the property in equal shares with another company also registered in GPE . However , on DATE the first applicant and the other co - owner transferred their shares in the above property by way of gift to the second applicant . As from DATE the second applicant became the exclusive owner of that property .
CARDINAL . The applicants state that they are prevented by the NORP armed forces from having access to their property and using and enjoying possession of it .
CARDINAL . On DATE the “ ORG of GPE ” enacted LAW within ORG ” , which entered into force on DATE .
